entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
